name: Easter Egg Bounce
description:
Short and easy game to play just keeping the egg from falling and collecting chocolate bunnies. #CSGC2022 Art and programming by me.
Audio: https://jdwasabi.itch.io/8-bit-16-bit-sound-effects-pack Jump1, FruitCollect, Big Egg Collect
https://phoenix1291.itch.io/sound-effects-pack-2 Lose1
https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle background music

Also, this was made in about 6 hours. Just wanted to put that out there.
